channel.title: reinforcement learning on Claudio Noguera
channel.description: Recent content in reinforcement learning on Claudio Noguera

item.title: Tic-tac-toe dynamic programming
item.description: This is the first of many articles regarding reinforcement learning, which is something I want to master. I will try to do it using “Reinforcement learning”, by Richard Sutton and Andrew Barto as a reference. The objective of a reinforcement learning system is building a program that learns rather than the much more usual, the human learns and teaches the computer the result of its learning. As with everything, first steps are humble: the tic-tac-toe game.
